Pre-Game Insights: Nick Castellanos expressed that he did not believe the Mets were a better team than the Phillies overall, but acknowledged that they were the better team in the series.
Post-Match Reflections: Nick Castellanos gave the Mets credit for their performance in the series and acknowledged their hot form.
Others: The Mets advanced to the NLCS for the first time since 2015, awaiting the winner of the Padres-Dodgers series.
